inclusion.criterion: free light chain values >100 mg/L for k chains or >50 mg/L for lambda chains
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: fistula or central venous catheter with blood flow >250 ml/min
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: multiple myeloma requiring the double PMMA filter application
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no mention of multiple myeloma diagnosis or treatment

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but no other relevant medical history mentioned.
